[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/repository-json-schema](./repository-json-schema.md) &gt; [JsonSchemaOptions](./repository-json-schema.jsonschemaoptions.md) &gt; [includeRelations](./repository-json-schema.jsonschemaoptions.includerelations.md)

## JsonSchemaOptions.includeRelations property

Set this flag if you want the schema to define navigational properties for model relations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includeRelations?: boolean;
```
